name: Kenya Chan
bio:
I am a Project Officer within the Lifetime Learner Experience Unit at the University of Technology Sydney. 
I work on projects within the unit with the goal of streamlining processes that improve a Learner's experience.
I am also the principal Robotic Process Automation developer which automates repetitive processes within the unit free up time for my colleagues to focus on more meaningful work.
I am currently pursing a full-stack developer path on The Odin Project, and will use this site to showcase my skills.
